pr_title: Fix: Update Lit bundle parser regex.

timeline.message:
Fix: Update Lit bundle parser regex.

Now the pattern will not fail with a StackOverflowException
as we will search from the start character accepting
any characters until we reach the caught start character with ;

Update regex to only accept `

Fix template creation and expand test.
Fix the regex to be greedy.

timeline.bodyText: Nonblocking nit: this comment is not valid anymore
timeline.author: pleku

replies.bodyText: yes should just say contains {the tick} and the second...
